channel.title: Yuming Fu's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Yuming Fu's Homepage

item.title: How's the weather tonight?
item.description: Although astronomers do not study meteorology, some of them, especially observers, may pay close attention to the weather. Factors such as temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, cloud coverage, have great influence on the observation activity.

item.title: Extend disk volume with Ubuntu LVM
item.description: Introduction to LVM Steps with examples
